name: CUSTOM Gallery #4
liquid_code:
{%- liquid assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom assign border_color = section.settings.border_color assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal assign background_color = section.settings.background_color assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient assign full_width = section.settings.full_width assign content_width = section.settings.content_width assign lazy = section.settings.lazy assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius assign items_row_mobile = section.settings.items_row_mobile assign items_row = section.settings.items_row assign items_gap_mobile = section.settings.items_gap_mobile assign items_gap = section.settings.items_gap assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile assign modal_overlay = section.settings.modal_overlay assign modal_bg_color = section.settings.modal_bg_color assign close_size = section.settings.close_size assign close_size_mobile = section.settings.close_size_mobile assign close_icon_size = section.settings.close_icon_size assign close_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.close_icon_size_mobile assign close_radius = section.settings.close_radius assign close_border_thickness = section.settings.close_border_thickness assign close_bg_color = section.settings.close_bg_color assign close_border_color = section.settings.close_border_color assign close_icon_color = section.settings.close_icon_color assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color assign pagination_size = section.settings.pagination_size assign pagination_size_mobile = section.settings.pagination_size_mobile assign pagination_color = section.settings.pagination_color assign pagination_custom = section.settings.pagination_custom assign pagination_font = section.settings.pagination_font assign pagination_height = section.settings.pagination_height -%} {%- style -%} {{ pagination_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} .section-{{ section.id }} { border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px; overflow: hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .gallery-items-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; gap: {{ items_gap_mobile }}px; align-items: center; grid-template-columns: repeat({{ items_row_mobile}}, 1fr); } .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} { border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px; border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }}; overflow: hidden; cursor: zoom-in; } .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} img, .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .gallery-item-{{ section.id }} svg { background-color: #AFAFAF; } .gallery-modal-{{ section.id }} { width: 100vw; height: 100vh; top: 0; left: 0; position: fixed; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; opacity: 0; overflow-y: scroll; pointer-events: none; background: {{ modal_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: modal_overlay }}; padding: 10px; } .gallery-modal-{{ section.id }}.active { opacity: 1; z-index: 100; pointer-events: all; transition: all 250ms ease-in 0s; } .gallery-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} { position: relative; width: 100%; max-height: 95vh; height: 100%; } .gallery-modal-slider-{{ section.id }} { height: 100%; } .gallery-modal-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper { align-items: center !important; } .gallery-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} { display: flex !important; justify-content: center; align-items: center; overflow: hidden; box-sizing: border-box !important; } .gallery-modal-close-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: {{ close_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ close_size_mobile }}px; top: 10px !important; right: 10px !important; padding: 6px; background-color: transparent; background-color: {{ close_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.2 }}; backdrop-filter: blur(100px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(100px); border-radius: {{ close_radius }}px; border: 0px; box-shadow: none; border: {{ close_border_thickness }}px solid {{ close_border_color }}; cursor: pointer; z-index: 99; position: fixed; margin: 0px; } .gallery-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg { width: {{ close_icon_size_mobile }}px; } .gallery-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ close_icon_color }}; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }}, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }} { position: absolute; cursor: pointer; z-index: 99; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; opacity: 0.7; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; background-color: transparent; border: 0px; box-shadow: none; padding: 5px; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }}:hover { opacity: 1; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }} svg, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: block; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ arrow_color }}; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0.3; cursor: not-allowed; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }} { left: 20px; } .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }} { right: 20px; } .gallery-pagination-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0px; position: absolute; top: 20px; left: 20px; font-size: {{ pagination_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ pagination_color }}; line-height: {{ pagination_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .gallery-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} img, .gallery-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: contain; max-height: 94vh; } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .gallery-items-{{ section.id }} { gap: {{ items_gap }}px; grid-template-columns: repeat({{ items_row}}, 1fr); } .gallery-modal-{{ section.id }} { padding: 100px; } .gallery-modal-close-{{ section.id }} { width: {{ close_size }}px; height: {{ close_size }}px; top: 20px !important; right: 20px !important; } .gallery-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg { width: {{ close_icon_size }}px; } .gallery-modal-prev-{{ section.id }}, .gallery-modal-next-{{ section.id }} { width: {{ arrow_size }}px; } .gallery-pagination-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ pagination_size }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% unless full_width %} {% endunless %} {% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %} {% endif %} {% if margin_horizontal > 0 %} {% endif %} {% if pagination_custom %} {% endif %} {% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %} {% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %} {% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% if image_ratio == "portrait" %} {% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %} {% elsif image_ratio == "square" %} {% else %} {% endif %}
